sentences.english: He even calls her by a cute nickname, "Snips."
sentences.chinese: 他甚至用一个可爱的昵称，“小鬼头”来叫她。

sentences.english: This paper aims to carry on a new exploration about translation from the field of "pet name".
sentences.chinese: 本文主要从昵称这一领域对翻译学进行一次新探讨。

sentences.english: The federated server retrieves this information during nickname registration.
sentences.chinese: 联邦服务器在昵称注册时获取这种信息。

sentences.english: Comments that consist of only the commenters name are spammy.
sentences.chinese: 留言内容中只有评论人昵称的评论可能为垃圾评论。

sentences.english: The 2010 World Cup team nicknames are presented by country alphabetically.
sentences.chinese: 2010年世界杯球队昵称按国家字母顺序排名。

sentences.english: Oh I forgot. Do any of you follow Ja, ? use a nickname?
sentences.chinese: 我忘了，你们有谁也是这样么，用昵称的？

sentences.english: It was supposed to be called "Little Phoenix" as it was his nickname.
sentences.chinese: 它被认为是所谓的“小凤凰”，因为它是他的昵称。

sentences.english: You can perform the following data movement operations on nicknames.
sentences.chinese: 您可以对昵称执行以下数据移动操作。

sentences.english: No physical index is built at the federated server on behalf of this nickname.
sentences.chinese: 在联邦服务器上，不会建立代表该昵称的物理索引。

sentences.english: "Selecao", the nickname of the Brazil national team.
sentences.chinese: “桑巴军团”是巴西国家足球队的昵称。

sentences.english: One of several clubs to have multiple nicknames.
sentences.chinese: 布莱克浦是少数几个多昵称的球队之一。

sentences.english: This is the nickname in most Chinese military forums.
sentences.chinese: 这是大多数中国军事论坛上的昵称。

sentences.english: The nickname of The Big Apple first came from the sport of horserace.
sentences.chinese: 大苹果的昵称首先来自赛马运动。

sentences.english: Messier used to have the nickname ' J2M'.
sentences.chinese: 管理风格米歇尔曾有个昵称，叫‘j2m’。

sentences.english: QQ nickname still corresponds to the "Voice of God."
sentences.chinese: 昵称仍为QQ相对应的“上帝之音”。

sentences.english: Don't use a silly, grandiose user ID or screen name.
sentences.chinese: 不要使用愚蠢的，哗众取宠的ID或昵称。

definition: stage name (of an actor or actress)
to shout/to call/to order/to ask/to be called/by (indicates agent in the passive mood)
to write characters in simplified form/the simplified form of a character/to abbreviate (a word or expression)/to write in simple language
Zen saying repeated as cant/(fig.) catchphrase/mantra/favorite expression/stock phrase
